title: Symbol meaning
text: Stars show how confident we are $$(=$$ the level of statistical significance). Each stars corresponds to different alpha levels. More stars mean stronger evidence.

hintAnswer: They indicate the level of statistical significance (more stars $$=$$ stronger significance)
title: Recall conventions
text: What does each number of stars represent?
choices: They show how strong the correlation is in size
They indicate the level of statistical significance (more stars $$=$$ stronger significance)
They show the sample size of each study
They mark which correlations are positive or negative

title: Compare evidence levels
text: Which result has the strongest evidence?
choices: All stars represent the same level of evidence.
